EmailTemplate.subject: NGA 2023: Join NCR to see where grocery retail is headed
EmailTemplate.textOnly: It’s no secret that grocery eCommerce sales have surged to an all-time high, and the trend is here to stay. In fact, online grocery sales are projected to hit roughly 161 billion next year <[[https://www.oberlo.com/statistics/online-grocery-market#:~:text=In%202023%2C%20online%20grocery%20sales,increase%20from%20the%20previous%20year.]]> — made up of the 147.8 million online grocery shoppers across the U.S. To deliver the ultimate customer satisfaction, it’s all about self-service and giving your customers the flexibility to shop how they want, when they want. Join NCR at NGA 2023 in Booth #1319. We’ll be showcasing some of our latest technology advancements: NCR Freshop, our eCommerce solution specifically for grocers that can be ramped up and ready to go within weeks, our market leading self-checkout solutions that enable your customers to shop the way they want, advanced store analytics that make core business decisions so much simpler – and more.
